title: atlas_v3_sandia_hands falls on his back upon launch (drcsim-3.0)

content.raw:
In order to do integration testing of our existing code with the new Atlas v3 model, I modified the old vrc_task_[1-3].launch and world files to load up the new model in the existing worlds where we have expectations for our existing controller.  However, we can't really do anything in these worlds because Atlas immediately falls on its back due to his starting position and the new mass distribution from the backpack.

The attached archive contains the modified database.config for the drcsim-3.0 gazebo models directory and the world file/launch file for vrc_task_2
